dataitem.name: I062/010
dataitem.title: Data Source Identifier
dataitem.definition: Identification of the system sending the data

dataitem.name: I062/015
dataitem.title: Service Identification
dataitem.definition: Identification of the service provided to one or more users

structure.name: ServiceIdentification
structure.desc: the service identification is allocated by the system

dataitem.name: I062/070
dataitem.title: Time Of Track Information
dataitem.definition: Absolute time stamping of the information provided in the track message, in the form of elapsed time since last midnight, expressed as UTC

dataitem.name: I062/100
dataitem.title: Position in Cartesian Co-ordinates
dataitem.definition: Position of a target in Cartesian co-ordinates, in two's complement form

dataitem.name: I062/185
dataitem.title: Calculated Track Velocity (Cartesian)
dataitem.definition: Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian co-ordinat

dataitem.name: I062/210
dataitem.title: Calculated Acceleration (Cartesian)
dataitem.definition: Calculated Acceleration of the target expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates

dataitem.name: I062/060
dataitem.title: Track Mode 3/A Code
dataitem.definition: Mode-3/A code converted into octal representation

dataitem.name: I062/245
dataitem.title: Target Identification
dataitem.definition: Target (aircraft or vehicle) identification in 8 characters

entry.value: Callsign or registration downlinked from transponder

structure.name: TargetIdentification
structure.desc: ICAO Annex.10 Volume 1, Part 1, section 3.8.2.9 for coding rules

dataitem.name: I062/380
dataitem.title: Aircraft Derived Data
dataitem.definition: Data derived directly by the aircraft

entry.value: Trajectory Intent Data is available for this aircraft
Trajectory Intent Data is not available for this aircraft
Trajectory Intent Data is not valid

dataitem.name: I062/380-10
dataitem.title: Communications/ACAS capability and flight status reported by Mode-S

entry.value: Comm. A and Comm. B capability
Comm. A, Comm B and Uplink ELM
Comm. A, Comm B, Uplink ELM and Downlink ELM
No alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
No alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground
No alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground
No alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Transponder Ground Bit not set or unknown
medium aircraft between 7000 kg and 136000 kg
SPI present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
last message transmitted to the user for the track
first message transmitted to the user for the track
ADS-B data inconsistent with other surveillance information
track not resulting from amalgamation process
Military Emergency present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Military Identification present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Age of the last received track update is higher than system dependent threshold (coasting)
Age of the last received PSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Age of the last received SSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Age of the last received Mode S track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Age of the last received ADS-B track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Special Used Code (Mode A codes to be defined in the system to mark a track with special interest)
Assigned Mode A Code Conflict (same discrete Mode A Code assigned to another track)
Duplicate Flight Plan due to manual correlation

dataitem.name: I062/290
dataitem.title: System Track Update Ages
dataitem.definition: Ages of the last plot/local track/target report update for each sensor type.

dataitem.name: I062/200
dataitem.title: Mode of Movement
dataitem.definition: Calculated Mode of Movement of a target.

dataitem.name: I062/136
dataitem.title: Measured Flight Level
dataitem.definition: Last valid and credible flight level used to update the track

dataitem.name: I062/130
dataitem.title: Calculated Track Geometric Altitude
dataitem.definition: Vertical distance between the target and the projection of its position on the earth’s ellipsoid, as defined by WGS84

dataitem.name: I062/135
dataitem.title: Calculated Track Barometric Altitude
dataitem.definition: Calculated Barometric Altitude of the track

dataitem.name: I062/220
dataitem.title: Calculated Rate Of Climb/Descent
dataitem.definition: Calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft

dataitem.name: I062/390
dataitem.title: Flight Plan Related Data
dataitem.definition: All flight plan related information, provided by ground-based systems

dataitem.name: I062/270
dataitem.title: Target Size and Orientation
dataitem.definition: Target size defined as length and width of the detected target and orientation

dataitem.name: I062/110
dataitem.title: Mode 5 Data reports and Extended Mode 1 Code
dataitem.definition: Mode 5 Data reports and Extended Mode 1 Code

entry.value: No authenticated Mode 5 Data reply or Report
Authenticate Mode 5 Data reply or reply
Mode 1 code not present or not from Mode 5 reply
Mode 2 code not present or not from Mode 5 reply
Mode 3 code not present or not from Mode 5 reply
Mode C altitude not present or not from Mode 5 reply
Mode C altitude from Mode 5 reply
X-pulse set to zero or not authenticated Data reply or report received

dataitem.name: I062/110-5
dataitem.title: Extended Mode 1 Code in Octal representation

dataitem.name: I062/110-6
dataitem.title: Time Offset for POS and GA

entry.value: X-pulse set to zero or no authenticated Data reply or Report received
X-pulse set to zero or no Mode C reply
X-pulse set to zero or no Mode 3/A reply
X-pulse set to zero or no Mode 2 reply
X-pulse set to zero or no Mode 1 reply

dataitem.name: I062/120
dataitem.title: Track Mode 2 Code
dataitem.definition: Mode 2 code associated to the track

dataitem.name: I062/500-4
dataitem.title: Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Geometric Altitude

dataitem.name: I062/500-5
dataitem.title: Estimated Accuracy Of Calculated Track Barometric Altitude

dataitem.name: I062/500-8
dataitem.title: Estimated Accuracy Of Rate Of Climb/Descent

dataitem.name: I062/340
dataitem.title: Measured Information
dataitem.definition: All measured data related to the last report used to update the track

dataitem.name: I062/340-1
dataitem.title: Data Source Identifier
dataitem.definition: Identification of the system sending the data

entry.value: MODE 3/A code as derived from the reply of the transponder
Smoothed MODE 3/A code as provided by a sensor local tracker

structure.name: LMODE3A
structure.desc: Mode 3/A reply under the form of 4 digits in octal representation
